comment: Lemma used in proofs of substitution properties. If there is a disjoint variable condition on ` x , y ` , then ~ sb56 can be used instead; if ` y ` is not free in ` ph ` , then ~ equs45f can be used. (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1993.) (Revised by BJ, 1-Oct-2018.)
